thread.title: Halle Berry Transforms Her Look With a Headful of Next-Level Curls
thread.title_full: Halle Berry Transforms Her Look With a Headful of Next-Level Curls

author: Sophie Schulte-Hillen
title: Halle Berry Transforms Her Look With a Headful of Next-Level Curls
text:
Halle Berry Transforms Her Look With a Headful of Next-Level Curls January 10, 2017 1:17 pm Expand Photo: Courtesy of The Mega Agency Halle Berry may have made long, honeyed layers and the occasional pixie her style signatures in recent years, but in a career spanning three decades, the Oscar winner has pulled off everything from dreads to cornrows with bombshell swagger. Her latest hair hit: a bigger-is-better cloud of curls finished with sun-kissed ombré streaks for a girls’ night out in Los Angeles.
It’s the kind of head-turning look that makes an impact without so much as a dab of concealer or a swipe of mascara—at age 50, Berry’s bare skin is a revelation—and feels that much more appealing for its youthful makeup-not-required confidence. Here’s to kicking off 2017 with plenty of good hair karma in tow.
